name: Canal Cruise with VIP Entry to London Zoo
description: Fully immerse yourself in the local culture of London with this fun and exciting tour of the most popular market in the capital along with VIP entry to London zoo. We stop by literary giant Charles Dickens childhood home, as we hear tales of his upbringing and learn how this impacted some of his greatest works. Checking out even more culture, we discover one of the most loved music venues and learn all about Camden’s punk rock past. You will discover a maze of market stalls and be free to explore, before stopping by the picturesque Regent’s Canal and jumping on a narrowboat. We’ll cruise down the canal and alight for a vip entrance into London Zoo. Explore London’s best zoo at your leisure as you unwind among the beautiful wildlife.
